alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Cook; Irwin; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:16AM EDT until June 15 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cook County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Irwin County in south central Georgia... Berrien County in south central Georgia... Southern Tift County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1015 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Pridgen to near Phillipsburg, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Ocilla, Tifton, Enigma, Lenox, Alapaha, Phillipsburg, Unionville, Vanceville, Cottle, Eldorado, Staunton, Berrien Co A/P, Gladys, Massee, Osierfield, Glory, Bannockburn, Tift Airport and Fender. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Berrien; Cook; Irwin; Tift
